name: Niloc
description:
Welcome to Niloc! A Local Co-op Moba/Brawler where you can pit yourself against up to 3 of your friends in a mash em up of mystical and over the top combat, featuring a variety of spells and arena's that you can pick and choose to suit whatever playstyle you want! So sit down with a group of friends, and prepare for mayhem!

Niloc is only playable on PC using either an Xbox or PlayStation Controller.
This is a Student Project that we created for our final year at the University of Bolton, it combines our love of multiplayer and competitiveness into this ball of fun. So please enjoy, and good luck.

You can find game development details here.
